# models

```go
import "github.com/pzsp-teams/lib/models"
```

Package models contains simplified Microsoft Teams domain types used by this library.

<a name="Channel"></a>
## type [Channel](<https://github.com/pzsp-teams/lib/blob/main/models/channel.go#L4-L8>)

Channel represents a Microsoft Teams channel.

```go
type Channel struct {
    ID        string
    Name      string
    IsGeneral bool
}
```

<a name="Chat"></a>
## type [Chat](<https://github.com/pzsp-teams/lib/blob/main/models/chat.go#L18-L23>)

Chat represents a chat in Microsoft Teams.

```go
type Chat struct {
    ID       string
    Type     ChatType
    IsHidden bool
    Topic    *string
}
```

<a name="ChatType"></a>
## type [ChatType](<https://github.com/pzsp-teams/lib/blob/main/models/chat.go#L8>)

ChatType represents the type of chat in Microsoft Teams. Type can be either one\-on\-one or group chat

```go
type ChatType string
```

<a name="ChatTypeOneOnOne"></a>

```go
const (
    // ChatTypeOneOnOne represents a one-on-one chat.
    ChatTypeOneOnOne ChatType = "one-on-one"
    // ChatTypeGroup represents a group chat.
    ChatTypeGroup ChatType = "group"
)
```

<a name="ListMessagesOptions"></a>
## type [ListMessagesOptions](<https://github.com/pzsp-teams/lib/blob/main/models/message.go#L44-L47>)

ListMessagesOptions contains options for listing messages.

```go
type ListMessagesOptions struct {
    Top           *int32
    ExpandReplies bool
}
```

<a name="Member"></a>
## type [Member](<https://github.com/pzsp-teams/lib/blob/main/models/member.go#L4-L10>)

Member represents a member of a Microsoft Teams channel, direct chat or team.

```go
type Member struct {
    ID          string
    UserID      string
    DisplayName string
    Role        string
    Email       string
}
```

<a name="Mention"></a>
## type [Mention](<https://github.com/pzsp-teams/lib/blob/main/models/mention.go#L18-L23>)

Mention represents a mention in a Microsoft Teams message.

```go
type Mention struct {
    Kind     MentionKind
    AtID     int32
    Text     string
    TargetID string
}
```

<a name="MentionKind"></a>
## type [MentionKind](<https://github.com/pzsp-teams/lib/blob/main/models/mention.go#L4>)

MentionKind represents the kind of mention in a Microsoft Teams message.

```go
type MentionKind string
```

<a name="MentionUser"></a>

```go
const (
    // MentionUser represents a user mention.
    MentionUser MentionKind = "user"
    // MentionChannel represents a channel mention.
    MentionChannel MentionKind = "channel"
    // MentionTeam represents a team mention.
    MentionTeam MentionKind = "team"
    // MentionEveryone represents an everyone mention - applicable to group chats only
    MentionEveryone MentionKind = "everyone"
)
```

<a name="Message"></a>
## type [Message](<https://github.com/pzsp-teams/lib/blob/main/models/message.go#L21-L28>)

Message represents a Microsoft Teams chat message. It can be used in both chats and channels.

```go
type Message struct {
    ID              string
    Content         string
    ContentType     MessageContentType
    CreatedDateTime time.Time
    From            *MessageFrom
    ReplyCount      int
}
```

<a name="MessageBody"></a>
## type [MessageBody](<https://github.com/pzsp-teams/lib/blob/main/models/message.go#L37-L41>)

MessageBody represents the body of a message in Microsoft Teams.

```go
type MessageBody struct {
    Content     string
    ContentType MessageContentType
    Mentions    []Mention
}
```

<a name="MessageCollection"></a>
## type [MessageCollection](<https://github.com/pzsp-teams/lib/blob/main/models/message.go#L50-L53>)

MessageCollection represents a collection of messages, potentially with a link to the next page of results.

```go
type MessageCollection struct {
    Messages []*Message
    NextLink *string
}
```

<a name="MessageContentType"></a>
## type [MessageContentType](<https://github.com/pzsp-teams/lib/blob/main/models/message.go#L11>)

MessageContentType represents the type of content in a Microsoft Teams message. It can be either text or HTML.

```go
type MessageContentType string
```

<a name="MessageContentTypeText"></a>

```go
const (
    // MessageContentTypeText represents plain text content.
    MessageContentTypeText MessageContentType = "text"
    // MessageContentTypeHTML represents HTML content.
    MessageContentTypeHTML MessageContentType = "html"
)
```

<a name="MessageFrom"></a>
## type [MessageFrom](<https://github.com/pzsp-teams/lib/blob/main/models/message.go#L31-L34>)

MessageFrom represents the sender of a message in Microsoft Teams.

```go
type MessageFrom struct {
    UserID      string
    DisplayName string
}
```

<a name="Team"></a>
## type [Team](<https://github.com/pzsp-teams/lib/blob/main/models/team.go#L4-L10>)

Team represents a Microsoft Teams team.

```go
type Team struct {
    ID          string
    DisplayName string
    Description string
    IsArchived  bool
    Visibility  *string
}
```

<a name="TeamUpdate"></a>
## type [TeamUpdate](<https://github.com/pzsp-teams/lib/blob/main/models/team.go#L13-L17>)

TeamUpdate represents the fields that can be updated for a Team.

```go
type TeamUpdate struct {
    DisplayName *string
    Description *string
    Visibility  *string
}
```
